00051 void
00052 MLineSegment::Reset( const MVec3& pt0, const MVec3& pt1 )
00053 {

00055         _pt1 = pt1;

00058 //----------------------------------------------------------
00059 float
00060 MLineSegment::Dist( const MVec3& pt )
00061 {
00063         MVec3 hyp = ( pt - _pt0 );
00064         MVec3 vec = _pt1 - _pt0;
00065         float vecMag = vec.Mag();
00066         if ( vecMag < 0.00001f )
00067                 return _pt1.Dist( pt );
00068 
00070         float invLen = 1.0f / vecMag;
00071         MVec3 dir = invLen * vec;
00072 
00074         float t = invLen * dir.Dot( hyp );
00075 
00079         if ( t <= 0.0f )
00080                 return _pt0.Dist( pt );
00081         else if ( t >= 1.0f )
00082                 return _pt1.Dist( pt );
00083 
00085         return hyp.Dist( t * vec );
00086 }
